title: Tren linh vuc xa hoi: Cong hien tu hanh dong nho
lead: Gia tri cua thanh nien duoc do bang kha nang dong gop that cho cong dong va kha nang tao anh huong tich cuc ben vung.

sections.heading: Van de uu tien
items: Chuyen doi xanh, an sinh va nang luc so cho nguoi yeu the la cac bai toan xa hoi can su tham gia cua the he tre.
Cac hoat dong tinh nguyen can duoc thiet ke theo mo hinh dai han, co do luong ket qua cu the.

sections.quote: Moi hanh dong phuc vu cong dong deu la mot buoc ren luyen nhan cach va nang luc lanh dao.
sections.author: Thong diep hoc tap

sections.heading: Minh chung thuc tien
sections.label: THUC TIEN
sections.text: Tu hien mau tinh nguyen den cac du an day hoc mien phi, nguoi tre da tao ra tac dong xa hoi thiet thuc va de do luong.

images.caption: Ngay hoi hien mau do thanh nien phoi hop to chuc
Lop bo tro ky nang so cho hoc sinh vung kho

items.title: Mot du an moi nam
items.description: Moi nhom hoc tap dat muc tieu toi thieu mot du an cong dong co theo doi ket qua.

items.title: Lam viec theo du lieu
items.description: Thu thap phan hoi, do luong tac dong va dieu chinh mo hinh theo bang chung.

items.title: Ket noi lien nganh
items.description: Phoi hop giua nha truong, doanh nghiep va dia phuong de mo rong quy mo.
